resources.string: Click on the notification and tell us how you are doing.
You can cancel or confirm the alert before the countdown ends
An accident was detected, how are you?
We are reassured to know that you are doing well.
If you confirm your choice, the location tracking link will be deactivated.
Your location is visible only while you\'re driving, and only to friends and family with whom you\'ve shared the link.
Tracking link expires in one hour
Tracking link expires in one minute
To reassure your family and friends, the application lets you share your location while you\'re driving.
Your location is accessible via a link, and is only visible while you\'re driving.
You can define the lifetime of the tracking link and stop the location sharing at any time.
How long would you like to share your location?
Beyond the selected duration, location sharing will be automatically deactivated.
Hello, I use the application %1$s and I invite you to follow my location when I drive by clicking on this link: %2$s
Your trip could not be analyzed because the quota of authorized users has been exceeded.
Your trip cannot be analyzed. If the problem persists, please contact us.
The trip was not made with your vehicle.
The trip was not made with your vehicle.
The trip analysis is not allowed for your organisation.
Your trip has already been saved.
There is not enough GPS data to analyze your trip. If the problem persists, please contact us.
Your trip could not be analyzed because the GPS data are not valid.
Your trip could not be analyzed because the GPS data sampling rate is invalid. If the problem persists, please contact us.
Your trip could not be analyzed because you exceeded your daily request quota.
Your trip could not be analyzed because your account has been deactivated.
Your trip could not be analyzed because your account is not valid.
Your trip will be cancelled and not recorded
Your trip is not finished and will continue
Your trip will be analyzed and saved
Temporarily disable automatic recording of your trips?
The working hours have been changed. Would you like to save them?
This feature configures the automatic trip recording periods and labels the trips.
The synchronization of the settings failed, please try again later.
The update of the settings failed, please try again later.
